option.name: VM_PARAMETERS
option.value: -Xmx512m -Xms256m -XX:MaxPermSize=250m -ea

task.summary:
Added some folders to git
gradle/ and .idea/ were added to git, as they apparently should be. The former in order to make checkout from git work without having to mess around with gradle each time, and the latter just because (read it on SO).

Improved performance of the applicationList.
Next, fade in animation when the application icons are first loaded.

MESSAGE.value:
Implemented enable/disable of the floater.
This is done in the new SettingsActivity.

Added some folders to git
gradle/ and .idea/ were added to git, as they apparently should be. The former in order to make checkout from git work without having to mess around with gradle each time, and the latter just because (read it on SO).

Improved performance of the applicationList.
Next, fade in animation when the application icons are first loaded.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value:
Improved performance of the applicationList.
Next, fade in animation when the application icons are first loaded.
